title:
While feeding the gulls the other day I noted that a few of the more vocal gulls sporting  a dark gray head coloring were wearing metal bracelets on their right ankles. Was I fortunate to be the recipient of a visit from a fashionista or an escapee from a house arrest bird condo?



Who is banding these little beggars and why?



Please don\'t use my name.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=6304
